text: ālahi ke’irisu bek’eri lēla āmilaki yelemi፡፡ ḥiyawi rasuni chayi newi፡፡ manigelajetimi inik’ilifimi ātiyizewimi፡፡ besemayati wisit’ina bemidiri wisit’i yalewi hulu yerisu bicha newi፡፡ ya irisu zenidi befek’adu bīẖoni iniji yemīyamalidi manewi? (kefit’urochi) befītachewi yalewinina keḫwalachewi yalewini hulu yawik’ali፡፡ beshawimi negeri inijī ke‘iwik’etu beminimi negeri āyakabibumi (āyawik’umi)፡፡ meniberu semayatinina midirini sefa፡፡ t’ibek’achewimi āyak’itewimi፡፡ irisumi yehulu belayi talak’i newi፡፡
